# Image Assets Required

## Profile Images
- `profile/rangga.jpg` - 400x400px, team member photo
- `profile/tiffany.jpg` - 400x400px, team member photo

## Portfolio Images
- `portfolio/cuanx.jpg` - 16:9 aspect ratio, project thumbnail
- `portfolio/football-money.jpg` - 16:9 aspect ratio, project thumbnail

All images should be optimized for web (JPG quality 80-85%).
